results.text: The Warrior — Ismark Kolyanovich

dh2e-dread-of-zarovich.reading: A man burdened by a lesser name. His sword arm is true, his heart truer still.

results.text: The Sage — Inquisitor Van Richten

dh2e-dread-of-zarovich.reading: Broken but not beaten. The old hunter knows the beast's lair.

results.text: The Seer — Madam Eva

dh2e-dread-of-zarovich.reading: She who reads the threads will cut one for you — at a price.

results.text: The Penitent — Kasimir Velikov

dh2e-dread-of-zarovich.reading: Guilt drives him into the dark. His knowledge of forbidden places is unmatched.

results.text: The Artificer — Davian Martikov

dh2e-dread-of-zarovich.reading: Wings in the shadow. Eyes where you least expect. The raven family sees all.

results.text: The Broken Knight — Commander Gorev

dh2e-dread-of-zarovich.reading: Even death could not quiet his duty. The silver light endures.

results.text: The Heretic — Lady Cordelia

dh2e-dread-of-zarovich.reading: She turned from the dark path. Now she walks between worlds.

results.text: The Beast-Master — Zuleika

dh2e-dread-of-zarovich.reading: The alpha of the changed ones. She remembers what she was.

results.text: The Wanderer — Ezmerelda d'Avos

dh2e-dread-of-zarovich.reading: The monster-hunter who hunts alone. Her blade has tasted warp-blood.

results.text: The Innocent — Ireena Kolyana

dh2e-dread-of-zarovich.reading: The soul he craves is the weapon he fears. Her light burns him.

No Encounter — Oppressive silence, vox static that almost sounds like words.
Vostra Caravan — 2d5 wagons. Trade, information, or passage. Commerce/Fellowship test.
Refugee Column — 3d10 civilians. Starving, terrified. 15% chance of Strahd spy.
Strahd's Servitor Patrol — 1d5+2 elite PDF in black carapace. Demand ID, confiscate relics.
Warp-Mutants — 2d5 mutants. Attack on sight. 1-in-5 packs has minor psyker.
Plague Revenants — 1d10+3 walking dead. Toxic miasma on destruction (3m, T test).
The Hanging Tree — 2d5 executed civilians. One twitches (alive). 30% reanimate.
Warp Phenomena — Roll on Warp Phenomena table or select from list. 1 IP.
Strahd's Wolves — 2d10 void-wolves. Shadow party, attack if weakened. Alpha has fear aura.
Abandoned Vehicle — 50% supplies, 30% trap, 10% functional (2 segments fuel).
The Black Carriage — Strahd's personal transport. Empty. Invitation/warning/taunt note.
Vostra Seer — Lone elder with cryptic genuine advice. Cannot be caught or harmed.
Warp Predator — Major daemon (Daemonette/Bloodletter/Plaguebearer/Horror). Serious fight.
Strahd Himself — In person. Does not attack first. Courteous, terrifying. Hard -20 WP or 1d5 IP.
Temporal Echo — See yourselves from 1d10 minutes ago. Unsettling but harmless.
Gravity Flux — Gravity shifts 45° for 1d5 rounds. Ag test or fall: 1d10+2 I.
Whisper Storm — Personal whispers (dead loved ones, Strahd). WP test or 1 IP.
Blood Rain — Rains blood for 1d10 minutes. WP test or 1 IP.
Warp Mirage — Nonexistent settlement/person appears. Investigation wastes 1d5 hours.
Corpse Light — Ghostly lights lead to danger. Per test to recognize. Following triggers encounter.
Memory Bleed — Vivid foreign memory (Strahd's/Tatyana's/victim's). WP test or confused 1 round.
The Silence — All sound ceases 1d10 rounds. Vox fails. Psyker powers +10, Perils on any doubles.
Doppelganger — One Acolyte splits in two. Hostile copy (half wounds) attacks 1d5 rounds.
Warp Quake — Ground shakes. Ag test or prone. Structures may crack.
Emotional Surge — Overwhelming emotion (d6 type). WP test or act on it 1d5 rounds. 1 CP.
Fleshwarp Wind — T test or minor cosmetic mutation. 1 CP.
Clock Stop — Chronometers stop/reverse. 1d10 hours pass unnoticed.
Ghost Procession — Translucent dead march past. Non-interactive. 1 IP.
Vox Broadcast — All vox devices broadcast Strahd commenting on Acolytes' current actions.
Warp Bloom — Flora explodes in 20m (teeth-flowers, eye-bark). Difficult terrain. 1 CP.
The Fog Thickens — Visibility 5m for 1d10 hours. All Per tests at -20.
Psychic Scream — Psykers: 1d5 damage + WP test or stunned. Non-psykers: whisper.
Reality Thin Spot — Warp visible 1d5 rounds. WP test or 1d5 IP. Psykers +20 powers but Perils on doubles.
Strahd's Attention — Servitor-skull descends, observes 1 minute, reports. He now knows everything.
Observation — A servitor-skull appears, watches, and departs. Strahd gathers intelligence.
Gift — Supplies appear at the Acolytes' camp. A note reads: 'You will need this. — S.'
Weather — The weather shifts to match Strahd's mood. Storms if angry, eerie calm if amused.
Agent — An NPC the Acolytes trust is revealed to be reporting to Strahd. Or was always his.
Invitation — A formal letter arrives via Black Carriage. Dinner at the Spire. Attendance expected.
Demonstration — Strahd destroys something the Acolytes value (a safe house, an ally's home) to demonstrate his reach.
Conversation — Strahd appears in person for a 'chat.' He is polite, terrifying, and genuine.
Test — Strahd sends a challenging enemy (Warp-Thrall squad, daemon) to test the Acolytes' strength.
Information — Strahd provides genuine, useful intelligence about a rival or obstacle. Because it amuses him.
Abduction — Strahd takes someone (Ireena, an ally, a settlement leader). Ransom: complete a task for him.
